price: Indeed, they are in doubt concerning the meeting with their Lord; He truly encompasses all things.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآءِ رَبِّهِمۡۗ أَلَآ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطُۢ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
